OPENCTI_URL.description: The base URL of the OpenCTI instance.

OPENCTI_TOKEN.description: The API token used to connect to OpenCTI.

CONNECTOR_ID.description: A unique UUIDv4 identifier for this connector.

CONNECTOR_NAME.description: The name of the connector as displayed in OpenCTI.

CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.description: The minimum level of logs to display.

CONNECTOR_DURATION_PERIOD.description: The period of time to wait between two runs of the connector.

VULMATCH_BASE_URL.description: The base URL of the Vulmatch API.

VULMATCH_API_KEY.description: The Vulmatch API key used for authentication.

VULMATCH_SBOM_ONLY.description: If true, only vulnerabilities affecting software present in the Vulmatch SBoM are ingested.

VULMATCH_EPSS_SCORE_MIN.description: Minimum EPSS score for vulnerabilities to be ingested. Set to -1 to include vulnerabilities without EPSS scores.

VULMATCH_CVSS_V2_SCORE_MIN.description: Minimum CVSS v2 base score for vulnerabilities to be ingested. Set to -1 to include vulnerabilities without CVSS v2 scores.

VULMATCH_CVSS_V3_SCORE_MIN.description: Minimum CVSS v3 base score for vulnerabilities to be ingested. Set to -1 to include vulnerabilities without CVSS v3 scores.

VULMATCH_CVSS_V4_SCORE_MIN.description: Minimum CVSS v4 base score for vulnerabilities to be ingested. Set to -1 to include vulnerabilities without CVSS v4 scores.

VULMATCH_INTERVAL_DAYS.description: Polling interval in days. The connector polls Vulmatch for new and updated vulnerabilities at this interval.

VULMATCH_DAYS_TO_BACKFILL.description: Number of days of historical vulnerability data to import during the initial backfill.
